Abundant Base Quantity.Description: The quantity for abundant goods sold at stores. This value is multiplied by 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5 randomly to determine the resulting daily quantity.

Plentiful Base Quantity.Description: The quantity for plentiful goods sold at stores. This value is multiplied by 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5 randomly to determine the resulting daily quantity.

Common Base Quantity.Description: The quantity for common goods sold at stores. This value is multiplied by 1, 2, 3, or 4 randomly to determine the resulting daily quantity.

Limited Base Quantity.Description: The quantity for limited goods sold at stores. This value is multiplied by 1, 2, 3, or 4 randomly to determine the resulting daily quantity.

Rare Base Quantity.Description: The quantity for rare goods sold at stores. This value is multiplied by 1, 2, or 3 randomly to determine the resulting daily quantity.

Scarce Base Quantity.Description: The quantity for scarce goods sold at stores. This value is multiplied by 1 or 2 randomly to determine the resulting daily quantity.
